channel.description: Recent content in cocktails on CompSoc Cookbook

item.title: Textbook (Wikipedia inspired) Pi√±a Colada
item.description: Ingredients 1 part white rum 1 part (Alpro) coconut drink 3 parts pineapple juice Ice Method Add ice to shaker Pour in all liquids Shake for an arbitrary amount of time Profit!

item.title: Dark & Dirty Mojito
item.description: Ingredients 2 parts spiced rum 1 part ginger beer 2 part soda 2 part sugar water 1 part lime juice 5-10 mint leaves Ice Method Add ice and mint to the glass and bruise mint Add all liquids except lime juice and stir Squeeze in lime juice, add the lime and stir Pack with ice if desired and serve
